Responses to open text questions


Web Site: University of Waikato
Date of Analysis: August 08, 2020
Number of Responses Analysed: 16

Return to Summary Page



What do you think is the best aspect of this web site, and why?
Respondent ID Comment
1 The website is clearly structured and links are easy to find. Everything works as expected
2 clean, right amount of images, compared to essex...i.e. more professional.
3 The website is well-organized and informative. Categories listed in menu bar are clear.
4 You can find all subjects offered by the university.
5 Informations in the website were easy to find.
6 The main page has lots of news and events, and a intro video.
7 front page,it is attractive
8 It also had a side navigation bar, easy to tell where you are and goto next related page.
9 It has more links and good content and is organized.
10 Top menu had some useful options
11
12 simple and easy to use
13 mahdijaf@yahoo.com only search tool was usefull
14 Graphical Contetnt
15 Design is good
16 Easy navigation helps to find necessary information within a short time

How to read the table

The table on this page displays actual unedited comments each respondent made to the open question. If blank, no comment was made. The best way of looking at them is to read the comments and notice themes which occur regularly.


Content Analysis service at WAMMI.COM

WAMMI provides a popular additional service where respondents comments are sorted into a mangeable number of categories and presented according to percentage distribution and global usability scores. Examples of comments for each category are given in a written report. Please contact us for information about our Content Analysis Service.
